body.line1: I work primarily in JavaScript, Python and Web Development with great flexibility of learning and adapting to any programming language or technology.
body.line2: Apart from coding and technology, pretty much involved in exploring and learning about better design techniques, digital marketing, entrepreneurship and startups, business and project management.
